attributes.action: have the new logo of the London 2012 Olympics changed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new logo for the 2012 Olympics is awful and a complete was of money. There was nothing wrong the old logo. If they had to change the logo, it should reflect London, and the rest of Great Britain in a better light and not something that looks like it has been knocked up in ten minutes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
